elements.name: require(bool,string)(block.timestamp > time,Sells prohibited for the first 5 minutes)

detectors.description:
Sparrow._transfer(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/835475f60f683f3c65bd600b569a38b655018b40_Sparrow.sol#229-260) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- from == uniswapV2Pair && to != address(uniswapV2Router) && ! _isExcludedFromFee[to] && (block.timestamp < time) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/835475f60f683f3c65bd600b569a38b655018b40_Sparrow.sol#237)
	- require(bool)(cooldown[to] < block.timestamp) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/835475f60f683f3c65bd600b569a38b655018b40_Sparrow.sol#240)
